titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Administrative and Accounting records, RG 1
A Guide to the Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Administrative and Accounting records, RG 1 FA1587

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-22 05:44:40 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Administrative and Accounting records, RG 1

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Administrative and accounting files primarily including minutes and meeting records of the Board of Trustees as well as documents of record.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series 1: Board of Trustees. Series 2: Administrative records.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection was donated to the RAC by the Rockefeller Brothers Fund.
